desktop_kiosk.grid_system: Bento Grid - Mix of large featured items and standard items

mobile.structure: Sticky Header + Vertical Scroll + Sticky Bottom Cart
mobile.grid_system: Single column for featured, Two columns for standard

ProductCard.style: Cardless look or subtle border. Image dominates (60% height).
ProductCard.interaction: Scale up on hover (1.02), Border glow on selection

CategorySidebar.style: Vertical list with large icons. Active state has glowing left border and background tint.

CartDialog.style: Right-side sheet or Full-screen modal on mobile.
CartDialog.features: Large touch targets for quantity (+/-). Clear total.

ModifierDialog.style: Immersive modal. Big checkboxes. Clear 'Add to Cart' CTA.
ModifierDialog.layout: Two column on desktop: Image Left, Options Right.

instructions_to_main_agent: REFACTOR: Split the giant `KioskPage.js` into smaller components: `KioskHeader`, `CategorySidebar`, `ProductGrid`, `ProductCard`, `CartDrawer`, `ProductDetailModal`.
THEME: Apply the 'Midnight Gourmet' theme. Use `bg-zinc-950` as the global background.
SPACING: Increase all paddings. The interface must feel 'airy' even though it's dark.
TYPOGRAPHY: Enforce `font-heading` (Chivo) for all product titles and prices.
INTERACTION: Add `active:scale-95` to all touchable elements for tactile feedback.
IMAGES: Use `aspect-square` or `aspect-[4/3]` for product images. Ensure `object-cover` is used.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast is high (White on Zinc-900).
DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (e.g., `add-to-cart-btn`, `category-item-burger`).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless it's a subtle glow.
Always use 'rounded-2xl' or 'rounded-3xl' for a friendly, modern feel.
